DOC.brief_title: Optical Coherence Tomography ( OCT ) Data Collection Study
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , multi-center study . Ocular history examination conduct consented subject determine participation study . Subjects qualify continue undergo image eye use SPECTRALIS OCT .
DOC.criteria: Subject employee eye clinic . Age ≥18 90 . Able willing undergo test procedure , give consent , follow instruction . Healthy eye without prior intraocular surgery ( except cataract surgery Lasik ) without clinically significant vitreal , retinal choroidal disease , diabetic retinopathy , disease optic nerve . Caucasian decent ( selfreported ) . Negative history glaucoma . Intraocular pressure ≤21mmHg . Best correct visual acuity ≥0.5 . Refraction +6 6 diopter astigmatism ≤ 2 diopter . Normal visual field Glaucoma Hemifield Test Mean Deviation within normal limit . Clinically normal appearance optic disc , normal appear neuroretinal rim respect color shape . The optic disc examine ophthalmoscopically evaluation stereo photograph . When eye eligible , eye enter study intereye asymmetry ; one randomly select eye use measure . Unreliable visual field . The reliability index use guide well perimetrist 's note . Unusable disc stereo photo . Inability undergo test . Insufficient quality Spectralis OCT image ( determine Spectralis OCT examination , unusual circumstance ) . Minimum requirement : Retina completely include image frame , Quality Score ≥ 20 stored ART mean image , For ONHR scan : Center position error ≤ 100 μm . Note : Inability subject perform one two scan pattern insufficient image quality one scan pattern exclude subject eye study .
